mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music(musicno, title, singer, album, genre, likesu, playsu, youtube, albumno, singerno, genreno) VALUES (music_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{singer}, #{album}, #{genre}, #{likesu}, #{playsu}, #{youtube}, #{albumno}, #{singerno}, #{genreno})
mapper.select: SELECT musicno, title, singer, album, genre, likesu, playsu, youtube, albumno, singerno, genreno FROM music ORDER BY musicno ASC
SELECT musicno, title, singer, album, genre, likesu, playsu, youtube, albumno, singerno, genreno FROM music ORDER BY musicno ASC
SELECT musicno, title, singer, album, genre, likesu, playsu, youtube, albumno, singerno, genreno FROM music WHERE singerno = #{singerno} ORDER BY musicno ASC
SELECT * FROM music WHERE (singer LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' or title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' or album LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' ) ORDER BY musicno DESC

SELECT g.genreno as g_genreno, g.genre as g_genre, m.musicno, m.title, m.singer, m.album, m.singerno, m.albumno FROM genre g, music m WHERE (g.genreno = m.genreno) AND g.genreno=#{genreno} ORDER BY g.genreno ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM music
